page.title: 20THE AUTHORS
page.content: Eight members of Kirby and Broughton Women's Institute compiled the information about this area with the help of their husbands and friends. The National Federation of Women's Institutes is the largest women's organisation in the country. None of us actually lives in the area, although one member lives in a similar area which overlooks the Eastern edge of this one. Between us we are, or have been, housewives, teachers, Tax Inspectors and Local Government employees. Our husbands include foresters, farmers, Bank Managers, architects, teachers and engineers. We all have access to at least one car, which is almost a necessity in a rural area. There is a telephone in each of our homes.
